name: Qdrant
description: Qdrant is a vector similarity search engine that provides a production-ready service with a convenient API to store, search, and manage vectors with additional payload
short_desc: High-performance vector database for AI applications
author: Qdrant

form_fields.label: API Key
form_fields.hint: API key for authentication (auto-generated if left empty)

form_fields.label: Enable Authentication
form_fields.hint: Enable API key authentication for security

form_fields.label: Storage Threshold (MB)
form_fields.hint: Threshold for switching to mmap storage (default: 20000 MB)
